text: Jeffrey Charles William Michael "Jeff" ConawayGates, Anita. "Jeff Conaway, Actor In 'Taxi,' Is Dead at 60", The New York Times, May 27, 2011. Print edition May 28, 2011, p. A21 (October 5, 1950 â€“ May 27, 2011) was an American actor. He appeared in the movie Grease and the television series Taxi and Babylon 5. He was born in Manhattan and grew up in Queens. He worked as a model, child actor, and musician. Conaway had problems with drug addiction and died of problems from taking too many pain medications."'Grease' actor Jeff Conaway critical after overdose" , Reuters, May 19, 2011.. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Jeff Conaway
